I Specialize In

Front-end programming, as well as creating fast and beautiful web Apps using React

Efficiency

As a web-developer I always try being efficient as possible. It starts with manaing my own time at work, and continues with a non-stop learning of new technologies, frameworks and libraries.

UI/UX

Over the years it became more and more clear: the UI/UX design is a key component to a product's success. That's why I always try to see my products from the user's eyes.

Can do approach

Challenges make us better, and I always pleased for new ones.

Interaction

I believe that good interaction between customers and producers, between team-members, and generally between people, will lead for better performance.

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...


Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am David, a people person coinciding with analytical skills who can easily adapt to various environments and work under pressure. I love to learn new skills, in many fields: Sports, music, and of course: PROGRAMMING. During my life I demonstrated in many cases my capability to learn and implement my knowledge on a short time, and in a professional way. As a web-developer i'm using the most cutting edge and relevant technologies, and always check for new releases and updates.

Bachelor degree

Psychology and Middle Eastern Studies: Department excellence program, Certificate of excellence for academic achievements

Master Degree

Unique universal excellence program, full scholarship A+ (95) Thesis work in philosophy. From my thesis evaluation: "... this is a strong piece of work and the best of the theses I read from the program"

Self learning

Over the last year I managed to learn, mostly by myself, these topics: C, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, Mongo DB, algorithms, data structures, networks and more. You may view my linkedin badges on my linkedin page
